heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy, except partly cloudy far south and in the St. Lawrence Valley. Chance of a sprinkle or mountain flurry, mainly northeast. Highs from the mid 40s to around 50. North winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly cloudy or becoming so. Chance of an evening sprinkle or mountain flurry, again mainly northeast. Areas of valley fog overnight. Lows from the upper 20s to mid 30s, with mid 20s in the cold hollows. Winds diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Tuesday
text: Areas of valley fog early; then partly cloudy, except mostly cloudy northeast. Highs in the low to mid 50s, except mid 40s to around 50 northeast and in the Adirondacks. Winds becoming north to northeast 5 to 10 mph.
